definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: However, this came unstuck considering the mechanical layout.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这来未粘住的以机械的地面区划看来。

sentences.english: When we investigate soils and divide them, We must pay a great attention to the geological factors in depth.
sentences.chinese: 为此，在土壤调查与区划时，必须重视深部地质因素。

sentences.english: The second one is the theoretic frame of eco-economic regionalization.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分生态经济区划的理论框架。

sentences.english: Within the study area, Baihe Forestry Bureau land was classified into a two-hierarchy system.
sentences.chinese: 在数字化区划的森林经营类型中，二级系统被采纳。

sentences.english: Ecogeographical regionalization is the basis for spatial differentiation of biodiversity research.
sentences.chinese: 生态地理区划是生物多样性研究的空间分异基础。

sentences.english: The space remote sensing technology is applied to the investigate division of forest pests in the study.
sentences.chinese: 将航天遥感技术运用于森林病虫害调查区划中。

sentences.english: The optimized crop planting scale and distribution are the major contents for crop regional planning.
sentences.chinese: 作物种植规模优化与布局优化是作物区划的主要内容。

sentences.english: This paper analyses all kinds of possible situations of boundary for the reason of administrative division readjustment.
sentences.chinese: 分析了行政区划调整可能引起边界线变化的各种情况。

sentences.english: In this paper, the author reports main features of the Chinese simuliid fauna and geographical divisions.
sentences.chinese: 报道我国蚋类的区系分布和地理区划。

sentences.english: The name of the city area can not be used as a separate enterprise in the name of the administrative division.
sentences.chinese: 市辖区的名称不能单独用作企业名称中的行政区划。

sentences.english: The seismic zoning map is the basic information for compiling code for seismic design of any kind of structures.
sentences.chinese: 地震区划图是编制抗震设计规范的基础资料。

sentences.english: The administrative division adjustments have brought a far-reaching impact for the development of Guangzhou metropolitan area.
sentences.chinese: 行政区划调整对广州大都市区的发展带来了重要影响。

sentences.english: Labor-dispute arbitration commissions shall not be set up level by level according to administrative divisions.
sentences.chinese: 劳动争议仲裁委员会不按行政区划层层设立。

sentences.english: A name of a district under a city may not be used separately as the administrative division in an enterprise name.
sentences.chinese: 市辖区的名称不能单独用作企业名称中的行政区划。

sentences.english: Integrated geographical regionalization is the prerequisite and basis of regional study of sustainable development.
sentences.chinese: 综合地理区划是区域可持续发展研究的前提和基础。

sentences.english: We expected that this research would be able to provide a beneficial reference to the climate regionalization.
sentences.chinese: 期望本研究对气候区划研究提供有益参考。

definition: to govern/to control/having jurisdiction over/linchpin of a wheel (archaic)/noise of a barrow
land use plan (official P.R.C. government term)
pinyin: tu3 di4 li4 yong4 gui1 hua4

definition: evolution of sth over time/course of development/history
administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
to set up separately/to establish separate units
